Control Name: Assesses Results—Management and the board of directors, as appropriate, assess results of ongoing and separate evaluations.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Results—Management and the board of directors, as appropriate, assess results of ongoing and separate evaluations.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC4.2 COSO Principle 17: The entity evaluates and communicates internal control deficiencies in a timely manner to those parties responsible for taking corrective action, including senior management and the board of directors, as appropriate.
